Whisk eggs, milk, and cinnamon together.\n2. Dip bread slices into mixture.\n3. Fry on medium heat until golden brown.\n4. Serve with syrup or fruit."

Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.\n2. Whisk in milk and egg.\n3. Pour batter onto a hot griddle.\n4. Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook other side.\n5. Serve with syrup or fruit."

Beat eggs with salt and pepper.\n2. Melt butter in a pan.\n3. Pour eggs into pan and cook until set.\n4. Add cheese and vegetables.\n5. Fold omelette and serve."
